invalid_password: Invalid password. Password must be at least 8 characters long and not contain spaces.
password_mismatch: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
failed_to_set_password: Failed to set password. Please try again.
password_set_successfully: Password set successfully. You are now logged in.
no_permission: You do not have permission to do this.
must_be_logged_in: You must be logged in to do that.
invalidated_session: Your session has been invalidated. Please log in again.
invalidated_session_other: {player}'s session has been invalidated. They must log in again.
